DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients : English Spanish speaking Women Age 2129 year History one following : abnormal Pap smear , normal Pap smear , Pap smear , cervical cancer Exclusion Criteria Patients : Language English Spanish Male Younger 21 old 29 Inclusion Criteria Clinics : Family PACT provider Not Planned Parenthood affiliate Located one ten identify Southern California study county Sends cytology/histology specimens Quest Diagnostics West Hills Clinical care visit occur least 200 woman age 2129 year fiscal year 2011/2012 Has calculate average cytology interval le 30 month ( base last three year ) Exclusion Criteria Clinics : Not Family PACT provider Planned Parenthood affiliate Not locate one ten identify Southern California study county Sends cytology/histology specimens lab Quest Diagnostics West Hills Clinical care visit occur less 200 woman age 2129 Has calculate average cytology interval 30 month
